data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 30441, Version Hash: 5cef09fafbb46c3d0b505fcc3a1864a062681741
data.actual_result: In the audit logs, you see a message like "user#1111 deleted 1 message by user#2222 in 5205983...".
data.expected_result: In the audit logs, you should a message like "user#1111 deleted 1 message by user#2222 in #channel".
data.short_description: The audit log shows the channel ID instead of the name when a channel is deleted.
data.steps_to_repro: - Make a new channel - Send a message in that channel - Force a different person to delete the message you just sent - Delete the channel - Check the audit logs
